name: Nada Samy
description: I have one year of experience in the field of front-end web development. I specialize in creating user-friendly and visually appealing web interfaces, working with the latest technologies to ensure an optimal browsing experience.
descriptionProject-1: A simple static website built with HTML for structure, CSS for styling, and Bootstrap for responsive design and ready-made UI components.
descriptionProject-2: Simple House is a platform that offers a variety of easy and delicious recipes for all skill levels. With clear instructions and helpful tips, it makes cooking enjoyable for everyone!
descriptionProject-3: Petopia is a bilingual pet adoption website that simplifies finding and adopting pets by providing detailed information for pet lovers in Arabic and English.
